name: 10.15 "My Son, the Father" Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 10 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did Sam say most of a bartender's wages come from?
questions.explanation:
Tips.

	Frasier asked Sam how much he paid Woody. When Sam explained about the tips, Frasier said, " I won't bring it up again."

questions.text: Which one of Carla's sons wanted to be a priest?
questions.explanation:
Gino.

	Carla was very excited about this. She thought it meant she automatically got into Heaven, "no questions asked".

Cliff.

	He was published in the "Post Office Newsletter". The only one who thought Cliff was funny was Lilith.

questions.text: Which of the Marx Brothers did Lilith like?
questions.explanation:
Zeppo.

	She said that the way he stood there without any facial expression cracked her up. Ironically, Lilith very rarely makes any facial expressions.

questions.text: Who broke his tooth eating a crab salad?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	There was a shell in the salad. When he said, "I'm gonna sue him for everything he's worth" Woody thought Sam meant him. However, Sam was referring to John Hill.

questions.text: When Carla blew away the receipts Rebecca was up half the night arranging, what did she tell Rebecca she had?
questions.correct: Get out of Hell free card
options: Nothing she just laughed at Rebecca
questions.explanation:
Get out of Hell free card.

	Rebecca told Carla that she was evil. Carla said it was okay because her son was good.

questions.text: What was Cliff's "daffy definition" of a psychiatrist?
questions.correct: A guy who shrinks your head and your bank account
options: A guy who makes you even crazier than you already were
A guy who solves your mental problems, while causing you financial problems
A guy who gets paid to listen to you talk about things you don't want to talk about
questions.explanation:
A guy who shrinks your head and your bank account.

	Lilith laughed and said "Ouch bulls-eye." Cliff started to add "What's up with that" to a lot of the jokes he told to make them funny.

questions.text: What did Frasier say Lilith could hear?
questions.explanation:
A dog whistle.

	He was making reference to Lilith's strangeness for thinking Cliff was funny. Lilith said Cliff had "good stuff".

questions.text: What did Carla's son decide to become later in the episode?
questions.explanation:
Male model.

	He didn't want to waste his good looks on the church.

questions.text: Carla told God she was gonna be "good and nice".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Carla tried to be good, although she didn't start off well telling Rebecca to "shut up". To make up for all the bad things she did, she agreed to listen to Cliff polish up his act.
